resources.string:
"Developer options. Gain access to extra features. 
" ✓" cheat to get the coin prediction. 
" "Change the way the animation works(we couldn't decide on one): 
" ✓ " plusFlip extends animation flipping, 
" ✓" altFlip changes the polynomial function and 
" ✓" disScale disables the scaling effect."
"Correct choice will now be displayed with a RED border"
"Cheat mode disabled. Borders are default color"
"Swapping sides will now be animated with 3 flips"
"Swapping sides will now be animated with 1 flip"
"The coin will now flip with modified animation "
"The coin will now flip with default animation"
"The coin will now flip without scaling animation (also ++ flips)"
"The coin will now flip with preset scale animation"
